Name: Additional three billion dollars annually, that must be reinvested into NYCHA in order to address capital needs resulting from decades of disinvestment in its building stock.
Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature and Governor to provide their share of the additional three billion dollars annually, that must be reinvested into NYCHA in order to address capital needs resulting from decades of disinvestment in its building stock

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
This Resolution was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Public Housing
